full_output.summary: Results-driven Campus Ambassador and Frontend Developer with 1+ years of experience in the startup environment. Proficient in driving the entire product and project development lifecycle, from concept to delivery. Successfully initiated and led the "Chaai with Dreams" project, providing a platform for college students to network and share startup ideas. Demonstrated expertise in handling high-profile client projects, including successful engagements with US clients. Skilled in Next.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, and Figma, with a strong ability to integrate solutions like Nodemailer for enhanced communication. Currently excelling in an internship role at Dewallstreet Pvt Ltd, showcasing exceptional problem-solving skills, strategic thinking, and a commitment to driving business growth and innovation.

experiences.description: Initiated and successfully completed the "Chaai with Dreams" project, providing a platform for college students to network, share startup ideas, and transform their skills and knowledge. Organized and planned events to bring students from various campuses together, fostering an environment of collaboration and innovation. Created marketing materials, including posters and brochures, using Figma to promote events and company sales work, enhancing outreach and engagement.

Managed and delivered a client project for a US client, ensuring timely completion and successful handover. Spearheaded the development and implementation of comprehensive content and business strategies, integrating wireframes and landing funnels; devised presales and demand generation strategies for campaigns and workshops. Developed front-end applications using Next.js and TypeScript, ensuring responsive and efficient user interfaces. Implemented MongoDB for data storage solutions, optimizing data management and retrieval processes. Integrated Nodemailer for automated email notifications, improving communication workflows. Applied problem-solving skills to analyze and resolve issues impacting business operations and goal achievement. Increased efficiency in resource allocation by conducting detailed business requirements analysis. Developed detailed process maps utilizing FigJam to optimize workflows and improve project efficiency.

full_output.name: Sanjay N
